nodes.bodyText: It would make reviews of ST PRs lot easier if every PR didn't contain bunch of removals of throws Exception. Is this in any way related to the actual PR or is it just something you noticed while doing the PR? If it is related to the PR it is of course ok. But if not, please open one PR to fix all of these to make the reviews easier.
What is the reason to move so massively to not using TLS? Again, it looks a bit unrelated to the main PR.
I realized that it would be better to test just a "authorization" and let the encryption be.

I think this tests the super users well. But this test it self doesn't contain any verifications that the authorization alone works. Do you think it is sufficient that it is coverd in other tests? Or should we have something like:

Setup the clusetr without super users
Test that they cannot read and write
3 Modify the cluster to add super users
Test that they can now read and write.
I can add another test case for clarity with that scenario.
I think it would be good, because right now here you do not really know whether the authorization works at all.
I have decided to make it really simple and did these scenario in one test. It will be really time consuming if i do two separate test cases...
